page_not_found.description: The page you were looking for was not found. Please try again.

wizard.intro_text: Let's get started. In just a few steps, you'll be viewing the GitHub details for any user you want to check out.
wizard.step_one_info: Share some basic info, like your name.
wizard.step_two_header: 2. Fill in your email & agree to terms
wizard.step_two_info: Enter your email address and accept the user agreement to proceed.
wizard.step_three_info: Take a peek at the GitHub stats and profile details.
wizard.agree_to_terms: I agree with the terms and conditions.

validation.default: This value seems to be invalid.
validation.email: This must be a valid email.
validation.accept_terms: You must accept the terms and conditions.
